entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
